title: Custodia ruling a ‘speed bump’ not a roadblock for crypto banks, says TD Cowen
contentSnippet: A ruling last week declaring that Custodia is not entitled to a master account is not the end of the road, said a TD Cowen analyst.

title: Nasdaq Reprimands TON Treasury for $558 Million Stock Sale, Crypto Buy
contentSnippet: Nasdaq said TON Strategy failed to get shareholder approval for a massive crypto-fueled fundraise—but stopped short of delisting the company’s stock.

title: Chainlink Drops 10% Amid Crypto Selloff; New Rewards Program Unveiled
contentSnippet: The oracle network's token hit its weakest price since the October 10 crash, breaking key support levels after multiple failed breakout last week.

title: Morning Minute: Tether Prints $10 Billion in Profit
contentSnippet: Stablecoin giant Tether has tripled its USDT supply since 2023, and generating profits that would make major banks jealous.

title: Ripple Prime Clients Gain Access to Spot Crypto Trading
contentSnippet: Ripple acquired prime brokerage Hidden Road for $1.25 billion in April.

title: Kraken unlocks crypto collateral for derivatives across the EU
contentSnippet: Kraken will now allow traders to post crypto collateral in the European Union via its MiFID-regulated derivatives platform.

title: 35 key crypto hires, moves and exits: October 2025
contentSnippet: A look at the most notable hires, moves and exits in the broader crypto ecosystem during the month of October.

title: BitMine Adds $294 Million in Ethereum as Tom Lee Makes Bullish Bitcoin, ETH Price Projections
contentSnippet: BitMine Immersion shares were trading more than 8% lower on Monday after the firm acquired over 82,000 ETH in the last week.

title: HIVE Digital accelerates AI infrastructure push with $1.7 million Canada data-center land deal
contentSnippet: Bitcoin miners are repositioning themselves as infrastructure providers for hyperscalers amid soaring demand for AI compute power.

title: Stellar Holds the Line at $0.277 as Buyers Defend Key Support Zone
contentSnippet: XLM steadies after a sharp 5.5% sell-off, with traders watching the $0.277 level as the critical line between recovery and renewed downside pressure.

title: ICP Slides 5.5% as Bulls Lose Momentum After Volatile Session
contentSnippet: The token climbed to nearly $4.30 late on Sunday, before tracking downward throughout Monday.

title: President Trump talks crypto, corruption and Changpeng Zhao in ’60 Minutes’ interview
contentSnippet: In an extended interview, President Donald Trump reiterated his pardon for Changpeng Zhao and making America "number one" for crypto.

title: Strategy Snaps Up More Bitcoin Amid BTC Price Drop
contentSnippet: Strategy's buy was among its smallest. Bitcoin's price has fallen more than 7% over the past week.

title: Hedera’s HBAR Slides 5% as $0.19 Support Crumbles, Traders Eye Technical Reversal
contentSnippet: Hedera token breaks key technical level amid volume surge, though late-session reversal signals emerge.

title: CZ Pumps Aster 25% with Tweet! Crypto Majors Selloff! Trump distances from CZ!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors fell between 2–5% following a Sunday night selloff, with Bitcoin down 2% at $108,100, Ethereum off 4% at $3,720, BNB down 6% at $1,020, and Solana dropping 5% to $176. Among top movers,

title: BONK Tumbles as Meme Token Breaks Support, Tests Key Lows
contentSnippet: BONK slid to $0.00001232, breaking through critical support as sales pressure swept through Solana-linked meme tokens.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Dogecoin Plunge as Crypto Liquidations Top $1.1 Billion
contentSnippet: Crypto liquidations are piling up as Bitcoin falls 4% and altcoins like Ethereum, XRP, and Dogecoin have been hit much harder.

title: Major crypto investor Animoca Brands poised for Nasdaq listing through merger with AI company
contentSnippet: If the merger is completed, Animoca would own the vast majority of Currenc and assume its listing on the Nasdaq.

title: Polkadot Slumps as Bears Break Key Support at $2.87
contentSnippet: Heavy institutional selling pressure triggered a technical breakdown in DOT.

title: Crypto Giant Animoca Brands Eyes Nasdaq Debut via Reverse Merger
contentSnippet: Investment firm and crypto game publisher Animoca Brands plans to go public via a reverse merger, the Hong Kong-based firm said Monday.

title: Bitcoin Slides Below $106K as Cryptos Tumble, Nearing October Crash Lows
contentSnippet: The downturn in prices rippled across derivatives markets, liquidating over $1 billion in leveraged trading positions across all digital assets Monday, CoinGlass data showed.

title: Strive Proposes High-Yield Preferred Stock to Expand Bitcoin Holdings
contentSnippet: The preferred shares, dubbed SATA, are set to carry an initial 12% annual dividend, payable monthly in cash.

title: Toncoin Falls as Nasdaq Flags Rule Violation in $273M Purchase by Major Holder
contentSnippet: Nasdaq reprimanded TON Strategy, a major holder of TON, for failing to obtain shareholder approval before issuing stock to finance a $272.7 million purchase.

title: Cipher Mining shares jump 33% on $5.5 billion AWS AI deal, new 1 GW Texas site
contentSnippet: Cipher reported a net loss of $3 million for Q3, but also revealed a joint entity to develop a new 1 GW site in West Texas named "Colchis."

title: AI Payments Startup Kite Debuts Token With $263M Trading Volume in First Two Hours
contentSnippet: The blockchain firm’s native token debuted Monday with strong activity on Binance and Korean exchanges, following a $18 million Series A raise in September.

title: Ripple launches digital asset prime brokerage for US markets following $1.25 billion Hidden Road deal
contentSnippet: Ripple has unveiled a U.S. digital asset prime brokerage after its Hidden Road acquisition, offering OTC spot trading for XRP, RLUSD and other assets.

title: Powell’s hawkish tone leaves crypto investors in a ‘state of limbo’ amid $360M in weekly ETP outflows: CoinShares
contentSnippet: Investors interpreted Fed Chair Powell's remarks on the likelihood of December rate cuts as hawkish, Head of Research James Butterfill said.

title: ‘Orange is the color of November’: Michael Saylor’s Strategy buys another 397 bitcoin for $45.6 million
contentSnippet: Strategy's holdings account for more than 3% of the total 21 million bitcoin supply — worth around $69 billion.

title: Trump Downplays Knowledge of Binance Chief After Pardon Linked to Family's Crypto Dealings
contentSnippet: In a rare interview, Trump said he was told Changpeng Zhao was the victim of the Biden administration's “witch hunt” against crypto.

title: Crypto Prices Slip Ahead of US Jobs Data as Bessent Flags Rate Risks
contentSnippet: Crypto slipped in thin weekend trade as investors prepared for U.S. jobs data and weighed comments from Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.
